Package system

Class Const

java.lang.Object
system.Const
public class Const extends Object
Constants that are used project-wide. Instead of cluttering classes with their own specific constants and then having to hunt them down when they are needed in another class, this class contains every constant that is used within the project. If a constant needs to be changed for debugging purposes, it is easy to locate.
Since:
23
Author:
Cailean Bernard
